name: fullstack_open_part3_2019
description: fullstack open 2019 part3 express & nodejs backend

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../fullstack_open_2019/part2/puhelinluettelo && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fs_part3/fullstack_open_part3_2019/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit && git push && npm run deploy
